(46) 1.1st January, 1946.CABINET.COMMITTEE ON SOCIALISATION OF INDUSTRIES.Note by the Secretary of the Cabinet.THE Prime Minister has appointed a Committee of Ministers with thefollowing terms of reference : '" To consider questions of policy which arise in the working out ofschemes to give effect to approved projects for socialising industries and toensure a desirable measure of consistency in the preparation of those schemes.''The Committee is composed as follows : Lord President of the Council (Chairman).Chancellor of the Exchequer.President of the Board of Trade.Minister of Fuel and Power.Minister of Supply and Aircraft Production.Minister of War Transport.Minister of Civil Aviation.The Secretaries of the Committee are :-Mr. A. Johnston, Office of the Lord President of the Council.Mr. M. T. Flett, Office of the Lord President of the Council.(Signed) E. E. BRIDGES.. Cabinet Office, S.W.1,1st January, 1946.[31094]
